section.description: A vertical sizer can be created in an htmlhost area by adding a div that has the following attributes defined:

step.description: a5:target - attribute that describes the type of target, which can be either vsizer or hsizer.
a5:target_elem - attribute that specifies the ID of the element we want to resize as a result of dragging the sizer.

a5:target_adjust - direction to adjust size by (- means make SMALLER as you drag the slider down for vsizer or right for hsizer, + means make BIGGER as you drag the slider down or right). If the element is under (for vsizer) or to the right (for hsizer) then you will want to use '-'.
